actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to collect and disseminate information about pharmaceutical affordability assistance programs.

summary.text:
INsulin For Our Recurring Medical Needs Act or the INFORM Act

This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to compile and publish on its website information about publicly available pharmaceutical affordability assistance programs, including for insulin. HHS also must distribute various printed materials with such information to health facilities, including community health centers, medical clinics, pharmacies, and hospitals.

titles.title: INsulin For Our Recurring Medical Needs Act
INsulin For Our Recurring Medical Needs Act
A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to collect and disseminate information about pharmaceutical affordability assistance programs.
